contacts.add-contact-desc: Enter an Evan ID to add an existing account or an email to invite a new user to the evan.network.
contacts.email-desc: The selected user will be notified with your contact request. In the following form you can adjust the request message.
contacts.error-id-or-email: Please enter a valid Evan ID or email address
contacts.message-placeholder: Message sent to the specified user
contacts.message-prefill:
Hello,

I want to add you as a contact.

Best regards,
